items.title: UK-USA Mutual Recognition Agreement on marine equipment
items.summary: Documents relating to the UK-USA Mutual Recognition Agreement (MRA) on marine equipment.

items.title: Oil and gas: environmental submissions and determinations
items.summary: Interested parties can review records of applications and statements submitted to OPRED as required by environmental regulations.

items.title: Oil and gas: offshore environmental legislation
items.summary: Environmental regulations and guidance on offshore oil and gas exploration and production offshore gas unloading and storage and offshore carbon dioxide storage activities

items.title: Transparency data: UKAEA prompt payment return data from 2025 to 2026
items.summary: Prompt payment return data for the UK Atomic Energy Authority, showing invoices paid within 5 and 30 days of receipt from 2025 to 2026.

items.title: Smart Secure Electricity Systems (SSES) Programme: first phase energy smart appliances regulations
items.summary: We're seeking feedback on the SSES Programme’s draft Phase 1 energy smart appliances regulations and impact assessment.

items.title: Policy paper: Industrial Strategy
items.summary: Strategy document setting out a new economic approach to backing the UK’s strengths, with ambitious plans for 8 high-growth sectors.

items.title: Guidance: Music Export Growth Scheme (MEGS) privacy notice
items.summary: This privacy notice confirms how the Department for Business and Trade (DBT) collects and uses personal data from applications submitted under the scheme.

items.title: Make Work Pay: leave for bereavement including pregnancy loss
items.summary: We are seeking views on the details of a new entitlement to bereavement leave, including for pregnancy loss before 24 weeks.

items.title: Notice: Apply for the Heat Network Efficiency Scheme (HNES): Round 11
items.summary: The Heat Network Efficiency Scheme supports performance improvements to existing district heating or communal heating projects.

items.title: Research: Ambient gamma radiation dose rates across the UK
items.summary: Data received from fixed and mobile monitors measuring the ambient (background) gamma radiation dose rate across the UK.

items.title: Notice: Energy Related Products Policy and Energy Technology List (ETL): privacy notice
items.summary: Find details here about the Energy Related Products Policy and Energy Technology List privacy policy and how we collect and process your data.

items.title: Draft amendment to the Competition Act 1998 (Public Transport Ticketing Schemes Block Exemption) Order 2001
items.summary: This consultation seeks feedback on the legal drafting of an Order amending the Competition Act 1998 (Public Transport Ticketing Schemes Block Exemption) Order 2001.

items.title: Notice: Notice to exporters 2025/31: UK exporter pays compound settlement for breaches of export controls
items.summary: HM Revenue and Customs (HMRC) settlement from UK exporter for breaches relating to the UK export controls.

items.title: Landmark UK-US pharmaceuticals deal to safeguard medicines access and drive vital investment for UK patients and businesses
items.summary: Milestone deal secures UK’s medicines access for patients, with a wide range of groundbreaking new treatments to reach NHS front-line quicker.

items.title: Guidance: Determinations of the UK ETS carbon price
items.summary: Determinations made by the UK ETS Authority under article 46 of the Greenhouse Gas Emission Trading Scheme Order 2020.

items.title: Notice: Trade remedies notice: definitive anti-dumping duty on certain excavators originating from China
items.summary: The Secretary of State for Business and Trade is applying a definitive anti-dumping duty on certain excavators originating from China.

items.title: Accredited official statistics: Energy Trends: UK gas
items.summary: Data on the UK's gas sector, including production, trade and demand.

items.title: Notice: Green Gas Support Scheme (GGSS): expenditure forecast statements and tariff change notices
items.summary: GGSS quarterly year-ahead expenditure forecast and degression threshold comparison, and, when applicable, notification of tariff changes.

items.title: Smart Data Challenge Prize selects Moverly’s digital property pack as winner
items.summary: A Smart Data prototype that generates “Digital Sale Ready Packs” to make it easier to buy and sell a home has been named the winner of the Smart Data Challenge Prize by the Department for Business and Trade.

items.title: Official Statistics: Preference utilisation of UK trade in goods, 2022
items.summary: 2022 statistics on the UK’s utilisation of tariff preferences for imports and exports under PTAs, including trade in goods between Great Britain and the EU under the TCA.

items.title: Official Statistics: Preference utilisation of UK trade in goods, 2021
items.summary: 2021 statistics on the UK’s utilisation of tariff preferences for imports and exports under PTAs, including trade in goods between Great Britain and the EU under the TCA.

items.title: Official Statistics: Boiler Upgrade Scheme statistics: October 2025
items.summary: Statistical release on Boiler Upgrade Scheme statistics for the estimation of capital grant uptake to support the installations of low carbon technologies in domestic and non-domestic buildings.

items.title: Transparency data: Trade and Sustainable Development Domestic Advisory Group (TSD DAG): minutes, 19 September 2025
items.summary: Minutes of the second meeting between the TSD DAG and the Department for Business and Trade (DBT).

items.title: Carbon capture, usage and storage (CCUS): Ensuring fair access to CO2 infrastructure
items.summary: We are seeking views on the Storage of Carbon Dioxide (Access to Infrastructure) Regulations 2011 to ensure fair access to CO2 pipelines and storage sites.

items.title: Smart Secure Electricity Systems Programme (SSES): enduring governance
items.summary: We're seeking views on the Enduring Governance of the SSES Programme, and the technical and security governance functions to be part of these arrangements.

items.title: Notice: Smart Secure Electricity Systems (SSES) enduring governance: Balancing and Settlement Code modification
items.summary: The Secretary of State has made changes to the Balancing and Settlement Code (BSC) using his power under section 245(1)(e) of the Energy Act 2023.

items.title: Transparency data: COVID-19 loan guarantee schemes repayment data: September 2025
items.summary: The latest quarterly update of data on the performance of the government’s COVID-19 loan guarantee schemes. Data as at September 2025

items.title: An update on the Employment Rights Bill
items.summary: Agreement reached with key stakeholders on the unfair dismissal elements of the Employment Rights Bill.

items.title: What does the Autumn Budget mean for your energy bills?
items.summary: Billpayers to benefit from an average of £150 off the costs of energy bills.

items.title: Guidance: Marine geological carbon dioxide stores: consenting lifecycle
items.summary: Technical guide for the carbon dioxide storage industry.

items.title: Notice: Trade remedies notices: countervailing duty on PET polyester from India
items.summary: Trade remedies notices published by the Secretary of State for Business and Trade relating to the countervailing duty on PET polyester from India.

items.title: Guidance: Electricity transmission network infrastructure: Community funds
items.summary: Government expectations for how communities living near electricity transmission network infrastructure developments should benefit as a result of hosting these developments.

items.title: Research: Domestic energy affordability support schemes: impact and economic evaluation
items.summary: The final impact and economic evaluation report for the evaluations of the domestic energy affordability support schemes in the UK (2022 to 2024).

items.title: Transparency data: DBT: spending over £25,000, September 2025
items.summary: Reports on departmental spending over £25,000.

items.title: Notice: Warm Homes: Social Housing Fund Wave 3 (closed to applications)
items.summary: Funding for local authorities and social housing landlords to improve the energy performance of social homes in England.

items.title: Notice: Warm Homes: Social Housing Fund Wave 3 – successful Social Housing Landlords including local authorities and housing associations
items.summary: List of Social Housing Landlords, including local authorities and housing associations offered funding under WH:SHF to be delivered 2025 until 2028.

items.title: Transparency data: DBT: spending over £500, August 2025
items.summary: Spending by electronic purchasing card solution (ePCS), over £500.

items.title: Look up considerations for trade licences under the Russia sanctions
items.summary: As part of the statutory guidance, a look-up guide listing all considerations for trade licences for certain prohibitions, and links to general licences available.

items.title: Correspondence: Ministerial letter on cyber security to small businesses
items.summary: Ministers and the National Cyber Security Centre have written an open letter to small businesses and business representative organisations about cyber security.

items.title: Promoting electronic invoicing across UK businesses and the public sector
items.summary: HMRC and DBT are seeking views on standardising electronic invoicing and increasing its adoption across UK businesses and the public sector.
